analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders a small card for a department, displaying its name and the number of members.
analysis.Purpose: Serve as a reusable sub-component in the organizations module to visually present basic information about a department.

Components.name: DepartmentSub
Components.responsibility: Render department.name (or fallback) and department.members.length (or 0) inside a styled container.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declare and validate incoming props for the component.

department.description: Object with at least a `name` field and a `members` array to display.

analysis.Usage: Imported into parent views or components under modules/organizations to render each department in a list or grid. Example: `import DepartmentSub from './components/blocks/DepartmentSub.vue';`
Notes: The avatar `` element is currently commented out — can be re-enabled when an avatar URL prop is available.
Scoped `<style>` block is empty; styling should be added here if customization is needed.
Fallbacks are in place: name → 'Безымянный', member count → '0 человек'.
No dynamic methods or watchers are defined beyond simple interpolation.
